author: Trueblox
title: probably the worst set ever
review:
Box/Instructions

the box is small. it shows another build in the back. one instruction book.

Parts

WHY IS THERE A PIECE OF PAPER AS A PART!?!??! anyways, there are 6 pieces in the set.

Minifigure

this minifigure is the one of its kind. nothing to take off. not even his torso, pants head etc.

The build

#2EASY4ME . the whole build just takes a few minutes, maybe even seconds! is that small!

The completed model

looked ok. nothing else to say.

Overall opinion

this set is BAD. i mean seriously. USING A PIECE OF PAPER ON A LEGO SET?!?! plus the minifigure is crap. overall, DON'T BUY THIS SET.
